mapper.select: SELECT ACNT_NO FROM ACCOUNT_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL =#{memberEmail} AND GROUP_FL = 'Y'

SELECT ACNT_NO, LISTAGG(MEMBER_EMAIL, ',,') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY MEMBER_EMAIL) AS MEMBER_EMAILS FROM ACCOUNT_GROUP WHERE 1=1 AND ACNT_NO IN (SELECT ACNT_NO FROM ACCOUNT_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL =#{memberEmail} AND GROUP_FL = 'Y') AND GROUP_FL = 'Y' GROUP BY ACNT_NO
